item.title: Top 10 Kotlin Questions in StackOverflow
item.description: IntArray vs. Array<Int> In java code IntArray: int[] Array<Int>: Integer[] Create method: IntArray: 1 val intArray : IntArray = intArrayOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5) Array<Int>: 1 val arrayOfInts : Array<Int> = arrayOf(1, 2, 3, 4, 5) Iterable vs. Sequence Usage Iterable: 1 2 3 4 getPeople() .filter { it.age >= 18 } .map { it.name } .take(5) Sequence: start with asSequence() and end with toList() or toSet()… 1 2 3
